mapper.select: select t.title as 'title',a.name as 'adminName',e.`status` as 'evaStatus',o.id as 'orderId',o.`status` as 'orderStatus',t.e_status as 'eStatus',t.o_status as 'oStatus',t.create_time as 'createTime' from track_log t LEFT JOIN admin a on t.admin_id = a.id LEFT JOIN evaluation e on t.evaluation_id = e.id LEFT JOIN orders o on e.id = o.evaluation_id ${ew.sqlSegment} ORDER BY t.create_time DESC
